text: DON'T MISS PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Kerry Katona looks slimmer than ever in skinny jeans as she enjoys family day out... two months after tummy tuck and lipo 'You really like him, don't you?' Holly Willoughby admits James Norton is on her 'list' as Robson Green makes her blush Telling her secrets 'It's a lot of money to simply throw away': Tom Hardy 'loses whopping ¬£2 MILLION in making new drama Taboo' which he co-wrote with dad Edward 'I'm really worried': Stacey Solomon, 27, admits she is considering freezing her eggs as she's scared of having an early menopause Mariah Carey looks sexy in racy leather trench coat and fishnets as she enjoys romantic dinner date with toyboy beau Bryan Tanaka That's some smile! Michelle Keegan's ex-boyfriend Brad Howard 'wanted by Love Island producers for next series' Will he find love after the actress? No reigning it in! Tamara Ecclestone's daughter Sophia looks giddy up on her pony as she enjoys horse riding lesson Just returned from skiing Peter Andre's wife Emily shows off post-baby body TWO months after giving birth... and reveals hysterectomy fears following 'traumatic' labour 'The kiss with Jasmine made me want to vomit!' Calum Best's on-off girlfriend Lindsey Pelas admits his flirty CBB antics make her so jealous she won't watch Mummy's little princess! Victoria Beckham shares cute snap of 'baby girl' Harper, five, in a tiara and regal cloak... as she plants a kiss on David 'You're posing naked and going on about class?' Love Island's Kady McDermott and Oliva Buckland lead backlash at Jodie Marsh over 'porn star' rant Ed Sheeran is replaced by a teenage lookalike as he rolls back the years in nostalgic new video for 'love song to Suffolk' Castle On The Hill SPOILER ALERT! Corrie's troubled teen Bethany Platt is turned away from club for being drunk... before creepy Nathan Curtis is seen sweeping her away The sweetest thing: New mum Geri Horner celebrates her blended family with cupcakes tribute after welcoming son Monty at age 44 Blissed out Money on her mind! Kim Kardashian wants to 'sell Kimoji products in retail stores... following in the footsteps of Kanye and Kylie' Victoria Beckham oozes glamour in a blue blouse and billowing tangerine trousers as she attends Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week Colour block queen A whole Lott-a love! Pixie dazzles in a pink faux fur top and skinny cropped trousers as she attends Schiaparelli show at Paris Couture Fashion Week I like the way you mauve! Kylie Minogue sports thigh-skimming lilac mini-dress as she leads Schiaparelli attendees at Paris Couture Fashion Week Danielle Lloyd steps out as she prepares to meet with police after speaking out about terrifying sexual assault attempt she suffered as a teen Thandie Newton flashes her lean legs in daring thigh-split dress as she steals the show at Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week Westworld star Style in The City! Olivia Palermo scores another fashion hit in military-style coat as she wows at Schiaparelli Paris Couture Fashion Week show Quek her out! Olympian Sam shows off her amazingly toned figure in a series of sexy sports gear as she makes modelling debut after I'm A Celebrity 'We want it to warm the cockles of your heart': Emmerdale boss promises to find 'joyful' ending for Ashley Thomas' tragic two-year battle with dementia TOWIE's Courtney Green flaunts her toned stomach and peachy posterior in sizzling bikini snaps from Mauritius Filming starts next month 'This episode is impossible to watch!' Call The Midwife's brutal pre-watershed portrayal of domestic violence shocks viewers A hard-hitting scene TOWIE's Georgia Kousoulou puts on eye-popping display as she flaunts her killer curves in a Baywatch-style swimsuit on Mexican getaway The Inbetweeners stars Joe Thomas and Hannah Tointon are 'engaged after seven years of dating' He got down on one knee at age 33 'Relax haters!' Joanna Krupa insists she's not nude during bathroom selfie as she shows off incredibly toned body in skimpy beige undies Very hard to tell Did somebody forget their coat? Glamorous Lady Kitty Spencer braves freezing temperatures in Paris to attend the Schiaparelli show in a shirt dress Barefaced beauty Jessica Alba layers up in a flared trousers and oversized coat as she jets out of New York She never fails to turn heads Phil Neville's daughter Isabella, 13, is signed as a model after battling with cerebral palsy throughout her life as her mother reveals she 'just wants to be normal' 'What an amazing night!' Jessica Wright cosies up for a selfie with Michelle Keegan and brother Mark as she celebrates his 30th birthday Spot the difference! Ewan McGregor and co-stars reunite to premiere Trainspotting sequel in Edinburgh, 21 years after the original cult classic Team spirit! Queen Letizia of Spain and her mother-in-law Sof√≠a, 78, present the National Sports Awards in Madrid El Pardo Palace 'You're unpaid porn stars!' Jodie Marsh slams reality shows and their stars in EPIC rant... before causing further outrage by BLOCKING them on Twitter 'My favourite part!' Kim Kardashian shows her philanthropic side as she names visit to children's therapy centre the highlight of her Dubai visit Former child star Nicholas Hoult looks worlds away from his old self as he sports bushy new moustache at Sundance Film Festival Kate Moss unveils her latest capsule collection for the trendy French label Equipment (and she's taken her own coveted wardrobe as inspiration!) 'This is making my blood boil': Holly Willoughby is embroiled in a heated debate over whether drunk women wearing short skirts are responsible for rape 'You are f***ed up!' Giggling Mariah Carey eats marijuana cake with Bryan Tanaka at Amsterdam pot cafe New episode of her reality show Outlander star Caitriona Balfe puts on a very leggy display as she cosies up to on-screen husband Sam Heughan at the Trainspotting premiere Painting the town blonde! Paris Hilton catches the eye in edgy leather jacket as she enjoys a night out in London with a mystery male pal Double trouble! Melanie Sykes cuts a casually chic figure in a camel coat as she leaves Radio 2 hosting gig with Alan Carr All wrapped up Ferry happy to be back! Reality star Chloe reunites with Geordie Shore pals Marnie Simpson and Nathan Henry after CBB exit 'You wouldn't want to deal with my s**t': Jamie O'Hara calls time on CBB romance with Bianca Gascoigne due to drama with ex-wife Danielle Lloyd But has she flossed? Rihanna wears red-hot leather outfit and huge hoop earrings... as she heads to the dentist Most people don't normally get dolled up Feeling the chill? Orlando Bloom keeps cosy with a pink hand warmer on the Shanghai set of his new action movie Smart Chase: Fire & Earth EXCLUSIVE: Selma Blair's handsome boyfriend is unmasked as filmmaker Ron Carlson... as they brave the LA rain with her son Arthur Emma Roberts looks chic in distressed denim as she cosies up to fianc√© Evan Peters during night out to celebrate his 30th birthday 'Getting back in ballet shape!' Mick Jagger's partner Melanie Hamrick, 29, works up a sweat as she fights for her dancer's body after giving birth Naomie Harris oozes chic in a military-style dress as she picks up top prize at London Critics' Circle Film Awards with adorable co-star Alex Hibbert, 12 Hey mum-bo! Strictly's Kristina Rihanoff looks sensational in figure-hugging silver dress as she steps out with beau Ben Cohen... seven months after giving birth Tallia Storm flashes her racy black lace bra and taut tum in ripped T-shirt as she arrives at the T2 Trainspotting premiere in Edinburgh Flashed her toned tum 'We ain't seen the end of Begbie': Robert Carlyle hints he's set to star in Trainspotting spin-off The 55-year-old said the character will return Is that really a good call? Sam Faiers chats away on her mobile phone while driving... as she belatedly celebrates son Paul Jr's first birthday The original royal wedding! Unseen footage shows a young Kate and Pippa as beaming bridesmaids to black sheep Uncle Gary in 1991 EastEnders child star Maisie Smith, 15, is unrecognisable as she debuts glamorous look at London charity event Flame-haired star showcased vocal talent Kelly Brook cuts a stylish figure in statement burgundy coat as she cosies up to boyfriend Jeremy Parisi at School Of Rock musical in London 'We've had a drink, it's not the time!' Calum Best accuses Jessica Cunningham of making Nicola McLean cry on CBB... after drunken chat about Speidi feud Kylie Minogue looks effortless in a blazer with white bridal-inspired skirt at Paris bash... as she reveals plans to take fianc√© Joshua Sasse's name Coronation Street extra, 31, hits out at Facebook trolls who set up a bogus account calling her 'fake' after she lost three stone and transformed her looks Caitlyn Jenner grabs groceries in Malibu... after getting glam for President Trump's inauguration ball The 67-year-old trans-icon rubbed elbows with the First Family Ooh la la! Bella Hadid flashes her long legs in tight miniskirt while out and about in Paris for Fashion Week The brunette beauty opted for all black 'I suffered': Lily Collins reveals secret battle with eating disorder as she premieres new film To The Bone in which she plays anorexia sufferer Trying to resurrect your pop career? Katie Price shares candid karaoke clip of her singing eighties classic We Don't Have To Take Our Clothes Off 'My babies!' Jennifer Lopez puckers up for a kiss as she shares a cuddle with her eight-year-old twins The 47-year-old shared a picture in a cuddle-sandwich She's asking a lot of that bathing suit! Coco Austin nearly spills out of overworked one-piece as she enjoys Miami trip with daughter Chanel PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Racking up the dad points! David Beckham enjoys a cycling trip with sons Romeo and Cruz Struggled to remove his bike from his car Surprise! Gwen Stefani joins Blake Shelton on stage for an unexpected performance in Mexico They are powerful forces in their respective musical fields 'It's time to f***ing go home!' CBB's Stacy Francis lays into 'disrespectful' Kim Woodburn in verbal tirade after discovering her laundry on the floor 'I know for a fact': Kenya Moore claims Sheree Whitfield was the victim of an abusive relationship as the two spar on RHOA A stormy lunch Henna to impress Harry? Meghan Markle shows off a traditional Indian inking as she arrives at Mumbai airport after a charity trip Call the midwife! Our favourite TV drama has just been reborn: Christopher Stevens reviews last weekend's TV Keeping it casual! Elizabeth Olsen goes for the natural look in T-shirt and jeans as the stars dress down at Sundance Sat on a wooden box Strike a Posey! Parker dazzles as she vogues on the red carpet at the premiere of Columbus at Sundance The 48-year-old actress looked furry nice Patriotic from head to toes! Tiffany Trump shows off $725 Stars And Stripes shoes in White House photo next to brother Eric Nationalist feet Reese Witherspoon shelters from a downpour as she runs errands on a rainy Sunday The 40-year-old actress bundled up 'She's more dead to me than Kim': CBB's Speidi remain defiant in their hostility to Nicola McLean... before she hits out at Jamie O'Hara for not staying loyal to her in the fight From model to mom: Ivanka Trump goes casual with loose-tied hair and plain dress as she attends White House swearing in ceremony days after high glamor ball Tom Brady is going to the Super Bowl AGAIN! Patriots star POSES with his model wife Gisele as he heads to the NFL title game for a SEVENTH time She can count on him! Rashida Jones 'gets cosy' with Vampire Weekend star beau Ezra Koenig at Sundance They are rarely seen together in public Lady in red! Laura Dern dons leather Bottega Veneta skirt for the Sundance premiere of Wilson Two-time Oscar nominee was stunning 'They have been all over each other!' Iggy Azalea spotted with music producer Ljay Currie in Mexico Enjoyed the sunshine on vacation 'She can drink all her mates under the table': Shane Warne's daughter Brooke, 19, is a 'wild girl' and her mum fears she's inherited her dad's partying gene Taking your daughter to work day! Cate Blanchett carries her little girl Edith into Broadway theater for her play The Present Actress was beaming Sex, lies and CCTV... Illicit affair of Emily Watson's DNA expert and Ben Chaplin's spook took a violent turn in Apple Tree Yard, by Jim Shelley 'Emily Watson and Ben Chaplin have zero chemistry!' Viewers of BBC thriller Apple Tree Yard say they're turned OFF by string of steamy sex scenes TOWIE's Chloe Lewis flaunts her incredible figure in a skimpy purple bikini as she sunbathes in Sydney Offered a looks at her generous cleavage Medieval melee! Charlie Hunnam takes centre stage in new trailer for King Arthur: Legend of the Sword In Guy Ritchie's new blockbuster Smitten Jude Law cuddles up to gorgeous girlfriend Phillipa Coan as they enjoy a romantic stroll The Young Pope star, 44, refused to stray 'Someone close to us leaked the sex tape': Amir Khan and wife claim to have been betrayed over x-rated film made before they were together White hot! Kate Beckinsale stuns in a plunging kimono-style gown as she lights up the red carpet at the London Critics' Circle Film Awards 'Sauna Sunday it is!' Cindy Crawford, 50, wears just a towel as she enjoys a home spa day amid stormy weather Relaxing in her sauna Geena Davis, 61, is a Sundance stunner at Q&A event as she teams skinny jeans with a silver sweater A League Of Their Own stunner If you've got it, flaunt it! Roxy Jacenko reveals a generous glimpse of cleavage as she parades her gym-honed physique in a bikini at the beach Did a UFO give Uri Geller magical powers when he was three years old? Believes his powers were 'activated' by an encounter with aliens I didn't really mean I want to blow up the White House, says Madonna: Star claims she spoke in 'metaphor' at anti-Trump women's march 'How does Madonna saying she wants to blow up the White House help the campaign?' Piers Morgan blasts singer for her attack on Trump 'So proud of this team': Olivia Munn praises boyfriend Aaron Rodgers' team after Green Bay Packers' season ending loss Journey to Super Bowl Quick change! Rooney Mara jets out of Sundance... while Elle Fanning touches down to join the fun Sightings at Sundance Film Festival Turtle Power! Donald Trump Jr's son Tristan, 4, wears Ninja Turtle pajamas for lunch in the White House after two days of photos, balls and bowling for First Family 'Let Barron be a kid': Ex-first daughter Chelsea Clinton speaks out to defend Trump's 10-year-old son from cruel internet bullies Not a Donald fan though Newly-slim Corrie star Katie McGlynn shows off toned figure and pert derriere in tight gym gear as she heads out on shopping trip 'I didn't mean to emphasise them!' Olivia Newton-John's daughter Chloe Lattanzi claims she showcases her breasts on Instagram by accident Independent Woman in action! Kelly Rowland gets soaked as she braves a heavy downpour without an umbrella Soaked to the bone 'Moving in together isn't far off': Ellie Goulding 'splashes out on ¬£6 million London pad as she prepares to take the next step with beau Bobby Rich' 'Thank you, but this is me flexing!' Fitness fanatic Chloe Madeley SLAMS critics for branding her 'manly' as she shows off her VERY ripped arms in selfie Ooh la la! Millie Mackintosh sets pulses racing as she shares shot of herself wearing just a skimpy ivory slip during latest getaway to Paris 'They are the real stewards of our country's soul': Jake Gyllenhaal reflects on attending Women's March with sister Maggie 'He Will Not Divide Us!' Shia LeBeouf is joined by Jaden Smith as he launches anti-Donald Trump art project Never been shy Kendall Jenner flashes her fishnets and toned midriff in trendy high-rise jeans as she enjoys shopping trip in Paris with rumoured beau A$AP Rocky X Factor starlet Betsy-Blue English flaunts her ample bust and tiny waist in a skimpy gingham bikini as she hits the beach in Dubai Here comes the hotstepper! Daisy Lowe wraps out in a faux fur-lined coat as she steps out for Strictly Come Dancing tour in Birmingham Pierce Brosnan looks cheery at premiere of Laird Hamilton documentary at Sundance The 63-year-old actor looked dashing Love Me (hair)Do! Paul McCartney, 74, displays bald patch as he enjoys cosy lunch date with wife Nancy Shevell, 57 Never a dull moment! Football fans go wild for Rod Stewart's VERY enthusiastic performance during the Scottish Cup draw Smiled mischievously Designer Tommy Hilfiger, 65, and his bikini-clad wife Dee Ocleppo, 47, ride around on jetski during idyllic St Barts getaway Star attraction! Braless Kendall Jenner displays her nipple pasties AGAIN as she wears ENTIRELY sheer top in Paris for the second time 'She will be mortified!': CBB's Jessica Cunningham 'fears unreleased NUDE snaps could wreck her career' 'I f***ed up!' Nicola McLean apologises to a less than impressed Speidi after explosive eternal nomination drama... as his team BLOCKS her on Twitter Kim Kardashian's ex Reggie Bush is accused of getting his 'Miami mistress' pregnant and is even named by her husband in divorce papers Danniella Westbrook enjoys tender embrace from mystery man in Marbella... after revealing depression fuelled her drug relapse . 'Gary Barlow is very easy on the eye and Martin Kemp is gorgeous': Dannii Minogue gushes about married Let It Shine co-stars . 'The man. The myth. The legend': Liam Hemsworth sends fans into a frenzy as he shares image of his buff dad... proving the apple doesn't fall far from tree Not long now! Million Dollar Listing's Josh and Heather Altman celebrate the upcoming arrival of their daughter with a Beverly Hills baby shower The mad hatter! Jack Black wears 'make America rage again' cap as he promotes The Polka King at Sundance Many celebrities have been against Donald Pink power! Little Mix's Leigh-Anne Pinnock turns heads in tiny dress and racy metallic thigh-high boots for pal's birthday in London Specsy and she knows it! Katie Salmon channels geek chic in figure-hugging dress and thigh-high boots as she parties with girlfriend Dani Whittaker in Amsterdam Lisa Appleton threatens to spill out of her skimpy black bustier as she takes the party to the streets with a pole dancing demonstration 'I miss him so bl**dy much!': George Michael's boyfriend Fadi Fawaz shares emotional throwback post... as he 'calls in bodyguard following scrutiny from fans' Is this most hipster break-up ever? Ashley Hart writes a bizarre poem and performs mountaintop 'separation dance' with soon-to-be ex husband Buck Palmer Back to reality (TV): Khloe Kardashian models Yeezus jacket as she returns from loved-up Cleveland trip with Tristan so she can shoot KUWTK in LA No more babies! Kendra Wilkinson says she does not want to be pregnant again but has not ruled out adding to her family Would consider adopting Working up an appetite! Vanessa Hudgens heads out for dinner with sister Stella after spending the day at the Women's March in Los Angeles Ariel Winter, 18, and boyfriend Levi Meaden, 29, pack on the PDA as she leaves Australia after a love fest with her much older beau Make-up free Mel B showcases her low-key style in fur lined parka jacket in NYC...as she 'reaches out to estranged family after nine-year feud' Horror film Split frightens off rivals at the weekend box office scaring up $40.2m to nab top spot... as Rogue One tops $1b globally James McAvoy stars Kim Kardashian has 'talked Kanye West into appearing on next season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians'... two months after breakdown 'She is so strong and beautiful': Katie Holmes shares heartwarming picture of her younger self hugging her mother Kathleen Shares a strong bond Not the best shoes for the rain! Hilary Duff wears $1k furry Gucci slides as she runs errands in flood-ravaged LA Too bad it was pouring 'We haven't spoken in SEVEN years': Greed, fame and the truth about our toxic feud, by Olly Murs' estranged twin The star's brother even took wife's surname SPOILER ALERT: Carter-ed off? The Queen Vic is seen crumbling after pictures of shock bus crash emerge in dramatic Eastenders 'Disaster Week' teaser Avert your eyes! Former TOWIE star Pascal Craymer bares all in a VERY plunging grey jumpsuit as she heads to family engagement party in Essex Chlo√´ Sevigny opts for vintage look as indie queen attends premiere of Golden Exits at Sundance Film Festival Her favoured understated look 'Everyone talks about how awful she is to work with': 'Jacketgate' star Amber Sherlock, 41, 'wants the top job and sees everyone younger as competition' Curves ahead! Charlotte McKinney shows off her ample cleavage in a black bodysuit with jeans Busty model showed off her cleavage Cara De La Hoyde's pert posterior mesmerises her beau Nathan Massey who can't stop staring at the Love Island star as she showers in a bejewelled red bikini 'I'd love it more if I was in there with you': Shane Warne is inundated with sexually suggestive messages after sharing a photo taken from his bed Puppy love! Patrick Schwarzenegger and girlfriend Abby Champion go for a juice run with their dog in tow Took advantage of the break in the Los Angeles PICTURED: Kyle Richards shares never-seen-before wedding photos to celebrate 21 year anniversary with Mauricio Umansky Tina Hobley moves gingerly during date night with husband Oliver Wheeler as she's still reliant on a crutch a year on from her horror crash on The Jump Sold! Justin Bieber auctions off custom Ferrari once rear-ended in paparazzi chase for $434,000 Finally tired of one of his many thoroughbreds Nothing stops her! Jennifer Garner ignores flood warnings in LA to grab coffee and a healthy juice after a workout session Wore Montcler puffer Victoria's Secret model Elsa Hosk talks 'solidarity with my sisters' during mini Women's March in Mexico as she takes a break from photo shoot Armie Hammer sports stripes with his arm sling at Sundance for first red carpet since welcoming son Despite his obvious injury... 'Titanium plates await!': Richard Madeley shares broken arm selfie as he 'shatters elbow' after slipping on ice 'He battered me with his guitar case!': Michelle McManus 'is left stunned after she's assaulted by a man in a Glasgow street' 'Can't wait to see results!': Bachelor beauty Zilda Williams starts the first of 'six treatments' of laser lipo for her already slender figure 'She's been caring since the age of two': How TOWIE's Lydia Bright devotes herself to doing the school run and homework with her foster siblings away from the limelight 'It's a shame that still exists': John Legend speaks out after being called a 'monkey' by a racist paparazzo Talked about the despicable experience Holly Willoughby looks bleary-eyed as she leaves restaurant in all-black ensemble following evening out in London with pals Strictly stunning! Dance pro Karen Clifton is all smiles as she flashes her long legs in tiny leather skirt while stepping out in Birmingham Kate Hudson's brother jokes it's been stressful seeing her date Brad Pitt as rumours continue to swirl the actors are an item Linked for months 'The public's support reversed my upset': The Voice's Jazmin Sawyers reveals the vile racist Twitter abuse she received after representing Britain in the Olympics Is X-Factor being axed? Guy Sebastian confirms speculation as 'fairly accurate' after 'disappointing' 2016 season 'She wanted him to be a part of Monty's life': Geri Horner 'names newborn son after late singer and close friend George Michael' A touching tribute Here she comes! Giddy Katie Piper looks chic in white print jumper and cool culottes as she promotes new book in TV appearance 'I want it ALL before I start!' Danny Cipriani reveals he wants '¬£10 million in cash' to follow in his exes Kelly Brook and Kirsty Gallacher's footsteps on Strictly Come Dancing 'Every second of every day, I thank you for loving me': The Wiggles star Simon Pryce marries stunning personal trainer partner Lauren Hannaford in a lavish ceremony Rita Ora flashes her bra in a mesh top and shearling jacket as she jets into London after finishing new film role Hust finished filming Wonderwell. Friendly exes! Drew Barrymore says she's 'proud' of former husband Will Kopelman as she shares photo of him during Women's March Fringe benefits! Pixie Lott flashes her lean legs in sheer attention-grabbing vintage gown for Roaring Twenties birthday party in London Sophie Ellis-Bextor looks effortlessly chic in a colourful tweed coat and chunky scarf as she enjoys a stroll Dancing with John Travolta, with Michael Jackson on the DJ decks: Inside the glory days of hedonistic New York nightclub Studio 54 Among the VIPs 'I still think Gwen is incredible': Gavin Rossdale reveals his divorce was the 'complete opposite' of what he wanted (but he feels guilty for not finding love again) Off to church! Jennifer Garner hides under umbrella as son Sam wears Batman raincoat and Ben Affleck smiles during downpour Exes apart for a change Trinny Woodall looks winter chic in statement coat and faux-fur stole as she heads to an al fresco dinner with partner Charles Saatchi in London 'He doesn't care very much about me. And the feeling is mutual': Rick Parfitt blasts Status Quo bandmate Francis Rossi from beyond the grave in book Bernie Ecclestone, 86, watches on proudly as his glamorous wife Fabiana, 37, glides down the slopes during romantic Swiss holiday 'I laughed': Kyle Sandilands says he thought it was hilarious that his arch enemy Rove McManus and radio co-host Sam Frost were AXED from 2DAY FM breakfast show 'I was f***ing her!' CBB's Jamie O'Hara shocks housemates as he reveals 'thorough' sex dream about Nicola McLean despite Bianca Gascoigne romance Leggy ladies! TOWIE's Megan McKenna and glam pal Amber Turner flaunt their toned pins in sweater and heel ensembles as they enjoy girly dinner Wayne Rooney prostitute Jenny Thompson rocks tiny beaded playsuit as she joins EOTB co-star Zara Jackson for wild night out in Manchester 'My hubby wears my undies!' Jackie 'O' reveals her husband Lee Henderson often sports her briefs and 'loves' the soft feel on his skin Earning her style stripes! Supermodel Karlie Kloss nails off-duty chic in blue midi dress and fur hat as she steps out in New York She's a shady lady! Kim Murray covers up in sunglasses and a huge hat - but she can't hide her emotion as Andy crashes out of the Australian Open Feeling a little under the weather? Cate Blanchett braves cold New York weather as she arrives at Broadway after attending equality march Heidi Klum wraps up in a lumberjack coat and over-the-knee leather boots to watch Chicago on Broadway 'Maybe she could open a brothel?' Kate Ford jokes that Corrie character Tracy Barlow should become a prostitute ahead of her 40th birthday 'I didn't get it was because I was female': Emma Freedman reveals she was recently told by a potential employer she didn't get a job because she is a woman Hollyoaks' Stephanie Waring cosies up to boyfriend Michael Greco as they enjoy a double date with Brian McFadden and Danielle Parkinson Christine Bleakley cuts a chic figure in a tailored black coat as she cuddles up to husband Frank Lampard on date night Out in Manchester Matthew McConaughey cuts a low profile in beanie and shades as he jets out of London with wife Camila Alves Take that! Gary Barlow 'blocks' Sam Callahan on Twitter after the former X Factor contestant tweeted a near-naked picture of the Let It Shine judge Mad about plaid! Gigi Hadid wears colorful trousers as she heads out in New York The look book for her Spring 2017 collection with Tommy Hilfiger was unveiled on Friday. 'The Bellas are back!' Pitch Perfect 3 stars Anna Kendrick, Hailee Steinfeld, and Rebel Wilson practice dance moves on day one of rehearsals Fab in florals! Elizabeth Olsen shimmers at Sundance premiere of Wind River with Jeremy Renner World premiere was held in Utah Will.i.am, Tom Jones, Jennifer Hudson, and the bloke from Bush were bewildering on The Voice UK, by JIM SHELLEY Improved on ITV SHARE PICTURE
